snippet: Big Bird, who made an unexpected appearance in Wednesday's debate when Mitt Romney cited him as a likely victim of his budgetary ax, has become a recurring character in President Obama's campaign speeches.
abstract: Big Bird, who made an unexpected appearance in Wednesday's debate when Mitt Romney cited him as a likely victim of his budgetary ax, has become a recurring character in President Obama's campaign speeches.

headline.main: New Star on the Stump: Big Bird
